name: Erudite
description:
Erudite (DEMO Version) is a visual novel where you as the player dive into different stories familiar to any fan of science fiction and fantasy. By teaming up with the nefarious Professor Rendsna, you'll experience speculative stories firsthand. And before it's all over, you may have a new story to tell, as well.

Download Instructions:

1) Download the corresponding .zip file for your operating system (Windows/MacOS).

2) Open up the downloaded .zip file.

3) Drag the Erudite-DEMO folder to your desired location (i.e. your Desktop or your Documents).

4) Once dragged, open up that folder and double-click the Erudite file.

5) Enjoy!
